actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ettercap makes one Bite attack and one Claws attack, or it makes two Spit Poison attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 CON save or be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spit Poison
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 11 (2d8+3) poison damage.

bonus_actions.name: Web (Recharge 4-6)
bonus_actions.desc: The ettercap launches a gob of webbing at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 DEX save or be restrained. A creature, including the restrained target, can take its action to free the target from the webbing by succeeding on a DC 13 STR check. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The ettercap is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Web Sense
special_abilities.desc: While in contact with a web, the ettercap knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

special_abilities.name: Web Walker
special_abilities.desc: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
